Review_Text: How does addiction affect an entire family? This documentary takes a real, honest, and powerful look at a family coping with the legacy of generational addiction. Rather than focusing only on the person struggling with addiction, the film follows all five family members as they strive to overcome the far-reaching consequences of addiction that ripple throughout an entire family. Viewers will witness real and painful conversations, along with a tremendous love and loyalty. With today's addiction crisis, there are many families who may find hope and understanding with this excellent documentary. Highly recommended.
